EmailTemplate.name: 10K Connect - New Client User Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to 10K Connect!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to 10K Connect Community!
To get started, go to https://10k.force.com/10kcommunity Your user name is: {!Receiving_User.Username}
Thank you, 10K Advisors
